Henderson.Touro University Nevada: Touro University Nevada (TUN) is a private, non-profit institution of higher and professional education, in Henderson, in the U.S. state of Nevada. TUN is a part of The Touro College and University System, which includes Manhattan-based Touro College and New York Medical College, accredited by the Middle States Commission on Higher Education as well as Touro University, which includes both Touro University California and Touro University Nevada, accredited by the Western Association of Schools and Colleges. Touro University Nevada is a branch campus of its sister campus Touro University California which is in Mare Island, California.
